title: Rock Ridge Magic Bicycle Houdini Deck Playing Cards (Special Edition)
feature: Printed on Bicycle's signature Air Cushion Finish
Includes the Trick that Fooled Houdini
description: For this first time ever, the United States Playing Card Company and The Magic Apple have created an ALL NEW Deck called the Houdini Deck. The idea came from Anthony Gift and the images and original artwork was created by graphic designer Steve Mitchell. The handling of these cards are like no other. You'll get 2 Jokers, 52 playing cards and it even includes the WORLD FAMOUS Trick, "The Trick that Fooled Houdini." Both Richard Kaufman and Stephen Minch consulted on the instructions to the effect THAT ARE INCLUDED.Bicycle is a third party trademark and the Bicycle brand and product are not affiliated with Rock Ridge Magic.
